com.digitalglobe.platform2020.identity.configuration.collector

Class ServletOpinionCollectorHelper<T extends Servlet>

  • java.lang.Object
    • com.digitalglobe.platform2020.identity.configuration.collector.ServletOpinionCollectorHelper<T>
  • Direct Known Subclasses:
    AnnotationBasedOpinionatedEndpointCollector, CamelRestEndpointCollector, CamelRestUnopinionatedEndpointCollector

    public abstract class ServletOpinionCollectorHelper<T extends Servlet>
extends java.lang.Object
    A base class for endpoint frameworks that use a standard java servlet for routing requests. Subclasses will use the getServletRoots() method to find the collection of base URIs that should be prepended to all endpoints.
    Author:
    Josh Ghiloni

      • getServletRoots

        protected final java.util.Collection<java.lang.String> getServletRoots()
        Find the Servlet this collector respects in the list of ServleContext registrations, and get the list of its mappings.
        Returns:
        the list of paths this servlet is mapped to (with any trailing /* removed)
